636290.name: Nongünz Soundtrack
636290.description:
Nongünz - Soundtrack is the official soundtrack of the game.

With just a guitar and her vocals, Beatriz Ruiz-Castillo a.k.a. Beícoli tried to give her perspective of the game which ended up translating into 11 different tracks, beautifully composed and mixed by herself, that give another dimension to Nongünz.

01 - Prelude
02 - Nihilism at night
03 - Where monsters hide
04 - Your guns, your loss
05 - Honey, you're dead
06 - The Bellicose Ballet
07 - Last breath, last chance
08 - The game of War
09 - The one without soul
10 - Viva la Muerte
11 - Kill me 'til you're dead
636290.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 韩语, 荷兰语, 日语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 瑞典语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 繁体中文, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 罗马尼亚语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 阿拉伯语
